articles.title: Birmingham Pride kicks off with parade covering city in rainbows - BBC
articles.description: Birmingham Pride is 25 and will see performances from Becky Hill and Steps.
articles.content:
Crowds gathered to see Birmingham's Pride parade cover the city in rainbows on its 25th anniversary.
The parade made its way from Centenary Square and ended in Thorpe Street, near to the LGBTQ+ vill… [+1995 chars]

articles.title: Out of the blue, Hilary Mantel emailed me 40 pages of an idea. It turned out to be Wolf Hall - The Times
articles.description: Last month, the writer Alan Garner sent me a small gift, a curious glazed jar. In it, on a slip of tiny paper, he had written: From a poor man to his friend. Th
articles.content: Last month, the writer Alan Garner sent me a small gift, a curious glazed jar. In it, on a slip of tiny paper, he had written: From a poor man to his friend. There it was the essence of the author-ed… [+472 chars]

articles.author: Shaad D'Souza
articles.title: Jazz legend Pharoah Sanders dead at 81 - The Guardian
articles.description: Revered spiritual jazz saxophonist was known for his unique playing style and collaborations with John Coltrane
articles.content:
Pharoah Sanders, the revered American jazz saxophonist, has died aged 81. The news was confirmed by Sanders label, Luaka Bop, on Twitter.
We are devastated to share that Pharoah Sanders has passed a… [+1954 chars]
